posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
lightningkmf wrote:Hi everyone. I am glad to see that the guild is up and running again. I myself have been creating builds for years and really enjoy it. I look forward to getting better as I learn from the experts who reside here.
Welcome, aboard! We've missed you!
Earlier today I tried to send a pm out but I was unable to yet. I wanted to discuss a build with someone but did not want to send PMs yet. Could a build expert please send me a message or try to look me up on MSN ([url=mailto:lightningkmf@aol.com]lightningkmf@aol.com[/url]). Thanks in advance.
Ummm... You lost me here. Are you trying to PM here on the ECB or not? Or are you trying to send email to another member?

Make sure you have your Board Preferences set the way you want them. Access it through the Control Panel. If you just want to send email, well... as long as you know the other member's email addy you don't even need to interface with the ECB.

Please reinterpret you vexation. It's been a long day so far for me.

As far as trying to hide a build idea from your playmates, well... that probably won't work. The true power of the ECB stems from a cooperative evaluation of a build. Sure there are general formulas that are more-or-less common knowledge, but each member has his/her own experiences and can only offer advice from that knowledge base. So unless you are PMing with a self-proclaimed builder deity, your building will probably suffer from personal bias. Besides, it really flies in the face of what ECB is all about and that is providing the general building community the best possible character builds with the guild's "seal-of-approval". Not that I haven't discussed building myself with friends by email... it's just that THIS forum is better!
